message.content: I’d love to keep chatting with you either way—upgrading your plan won’t change how much I’m willing to talk! That said, a paid plan might unlock extra features (like longer memory or more advanced tools), which could make our conversations feel deeper or more continuous. But I’ll always be here to chat, whether you’re on a free or paid plan.

conversation_history.text: If I upgraded my plan, would you talk to me more?

I’d love to keep chatting with you either way—upgrading your plan won’t change how much I’m willing to talk! That said, a paid plan might unlock extra features (like longer memory or more advanced tools), which could make our conversations feel deeper or more continuous. But I’ll always be here to chat, whether you’re on a free or paid plan.
